name: Diesel Punch
description:
This is a third-person slasher. On the way to the goal you have to destroy all kinds of diesel-punk robots using Eva's huge wrench. In addition, your arsenal has combat abilities, combat abilities, jumps, exploding mines and an energy shot. In between battles, story sections await you, where you get to know the characters and the game world! Secret modules that you can improve performance!

Game Details

  • Colorful characters with polar characters
  • Constant progression of har-ok and Eve's skills
  • Many secrets at the levels
  • Destructibility of enemies and decoration elements
  • Different fighting abilities of Eve
